SMART VILLAGE

EMERALD BUSINESS CENTER

  • Owner: Edge Development & Projects Mangment.
  • Location: Smart Village – (b2210).
  • Built up Area: 21180 m2.
  • Total Area : 15150 m2.
  • Satart Date :21/1/2019 End Date:31/3/2021.

  • Value: 180,000,000 Egp.

Strategically located at entrance of New Cairo, occupies a prime position in Cairo’s most exclusive neighborhood, right on the rind road New Cairo is laid out as a series of gated communities bound on three sides by major roads one is Cairo’s -Suez, one extends to the Red Sea and the third is the rind around Cairo which loops to the airport just north of project.

Start with what you have now. If you’re early in your career, the most important thing is to get your work out there and keep growing. Even if you’re not 100% confident the work is perfect or you don’t know exactly what to say about everything (especially the meaning of life!), get a portfolio online and start building a presence on creative community sites like Behance right away. You will refine your work and how you talk about it as you grow as a designer.
